titles.title: MP954 We are marching in the light of God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We are marching in the light of God,
we are marching in the light of God.
we are marching in the light of God,
we are marching in the light of God.
We are marching,
we are marching ahha,
we are marching in the light of God,
We are marching,
we are marching ahha,
we are marching in the light of God,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We are dancing in the love of God,
We are dancing in the love of God.
We are dancing in the love of God,
We are dancing in the love of God.
We are dancing,
We are dancing ahha,
We are dancing in the love of God,
We are dancing,
We are dancing ahha,
We are dancing in the love of God,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We are living in the love of God,
we are living in the love of God.
we are living in the love of God,
we are living in the love of God.
We are living,
we are living ahha,
we are living in the love of God,
We are living,
we are living ahha,
we are living in the love of God,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We are moving in the power of God,
we are moving in the power of God.
we are moving in the power of God,
we are moving in the power of God.
We are moving,
we are moving ahha,
